name: Lightscreen AI
headline: Voice + video AI interviewer
description:
Lightscreen’s voice + video AI interviewer enables companies to identify and invest in genuinely skilled candidates. It's already being used by high-growth startups and recruiting agencies to screen technical candidates. 

We provide companies with a voicebot that can run a full-length technical interview, does smart interruptions, and multi-modal cheating detection. The AI provides the company rubric-based, rich candidate evaluation in minutes and can be fully customized to ask questions and evaluate based on the company's needs.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:recruiting; industry:talent-acquisition; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Prachie Banthia, Founder
founders.description: I'm a founder and CEO at Lightscreen AI. Before this, I was in VP Product at AssemblyAI. Before that I was head of product at Sequoia-backed rideOS, which sold to Gopuff for $115M. I started my career as an APM at Google. Stanford MBA. Dog mom.

founders.name: Gavin Saldanha, Founder
founders.description: I'm a founder and CTO at Lightscreen AI. I'm a software engineer with a background in ML/NLP. I previously worked in Google Cloud and led the engineering teams at Cauzal AI and Stacked. I did my undergrad at UC Berkeley and Master's at Columbia. I published a paper on text generation in collaboration with IBM Watson.

  * [Book a Demo](https://lightscreen.ai/</business>)


# Find candidates who are genuinely worth your time.
An AI-powered coding screen that’s as good as humans at catching cheaters, and highly predictive of real-world skills.
[Hire Better Engineers](https://lightscreen.ai/</business>)Learn More
Backed by![Y Combinator logo](https://lightscreen.ai/yc.svg)
## Trained by interviewers from top tech companies
![Google](https://lightscreen.ai/google-icon-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Amazon](https://lightscreen.ai/amazon-color-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Apple](https://lightscreen.ai/apple-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Facebook](https://lightscreen.ai/meta-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Netflix](https://lightscreen.ai/netflix-1-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![OpenAI](https://lightscreen.ai/openai-svgrepo-com.svg)
![NVidia](https://lightscreen.ai/nvidia-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Uber](https://lightscreen.ai/uber-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Tesla](https://lightscreen.ai/tesla-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Microsoft](https://lightscreen.ai/microsoft-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Anthropic](https://lightscreen.ai/claude-ai-icon.svg)
![Google](https://lightscreen.ai/google-icon-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Amazon](https://lightscreen.ai/amazon-color-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Apple](https://lightscreen.ai/apple-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Facebook](https://lightscreen.ai/meta-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Netflix](https://lightscreen.ai/netflix-1-logo-svgrepo-com.svg)
![OpenAI](https://lightscreen.ai/openai-svgrepo-com.svg)
![NVidia](https://lightscreen.ai/nvidia-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Uber](https://lightscreen.ai/uber-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Tesla](https://lightscreen.ai/tesla-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Microsoft](https://lightscreen.ai/microsoft-svgrepo-com.svg)
![Anthropic](https://lightscreen.ai/claude-ai-icon.svg)
## Meet Ethan.Your new top interviewer.
Our voice agent, Ethan, is the world’s most experienced interviewer, screening candidates at scale every day.
Ethan’s collaborative pair-programming approach puts candidates at ease, while giving deeper insight into how they break down problems and apply engineering fundamentals.
### Assessments you can trust.
Our proven AI evaluation system is as accurate as human experts, and fully customizable to your roles.
[See a real, anonymized example](https://lightscreen.ai/<https:/app.lightscreen.ai/eval/demo/matthewgreen/PalindromeChecker>)
### Built to be cheat-proof.
We use state-of-the-art AI to detect even subtle cheating. Plus, our live video call format makes it virtually impossible to pass without true skills.
Learn about our cheat detection
### Fun, engaging experience.
Automated screens don’t have to feel impersonal. Our voice AI lets candidates ask questions, get hints, and brainstorm, just like they do with humans. (The Australian accent doesn’t hurt, either.)
[Book a demo](https://lightscreen.ai/</business>)
### Make every minute count.
Over 80% of candidates list recruiter response times as a top complaint about the hiring process, and more than half have dropped out because of it.
**Don’t let top talent slip away.** Lightscreen notifies you minutes after a strong interview, with the transcript, video, code, plus highlights across key indicators. Everything you need to make a quick decision.
![Immediate, actionable feedback](https://lightscreen.ai/_next/image?url=%2Feval_screenshot.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Candidates love us.Cheaters… not so much.
![Cheating detection you can rely on.](https://lightscreen.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fcheater.png&w=3840&q=75)
**Cheating detection you can rely on.** Lightscreen uses industry standard cheating and plagiarism detection techniques, plus our own AI models trained to analyze behavioral patterns associated with cheating.
[See a real, anonymized example](https://lightscreen.ai/<https:/app.lightscreen.ai/eval/demo/danielwhite/PalindromeChecker>)
### The numbers don’t lie. But many applicants do.
#### Cheating is on the rise.
With AI tools getting better every day, cheating is rampant. In one survey, **one in three** candidates admitted using LLMs like ChatGPT to cheat on take-home assessments, and even live interviews.
Lightscreen detects cheating using a variety of AI models trained on proprietary data, which we refine and tune every day. Beyond simple plagiarism detection techniques, we analyze subtle behavioral patterns associated with cheating that are difficult to hide.
#### Today’s screening tools aren’t enough.
Other automated screeners report high detection accuracy rates, but these are skewed by easy cases where cheaters paste solutions or transcribe verbatim from an external source. These days, cheaters are far more sophisticated.
We ran our own study, instructing participants to subtly cheat on similar coding challenges across several platforms. We compared results to a blind review by human experts.
Lightscreen outperforms other screening tools at detecting cheating, while reducing false positives that incorrectly blame honest candidates. Performance is within 2% of human experts.
#### Good engineering is more than just code.
Lightscreen is a significant step forward, but as you can see above, neither Lightscreen nor humans are perfect at catching cheaters. That’s why we believe detection is only part of the solution.
Lightscreen’s interactive format has candidates explain, justify, and reason through their approach while they work. They weigh trade-offs and refine over time, the way engineers do on the job. That’s not a problem if you’re working honestly, but much harder if you haven’t solved the problem yourself.
So, even if cheaters evade detection, they’re still filtered out by our process.
#### Other Screening Tools
#### Lightscreen
Comparison of candidates **not flagged** for cheating. Cheaters who evade detection tend to get perfect scores on other platforms, but significantly underperform honest candidates on Lightscreen.
## But you don’t have to take our word for it.
Our AI-powered interviews aren’t just effective - they’re fun too! Our average customer satisfaction score for candidates is over 80%. Candidates tells us every day how much they enjoy the Lightscreen interview experience.
“The way the interview adapted to my skill level was mind-blowing. Ethan gave me just the right amount of coaching to get me unstuck, but let me find my own path to a solution. Other coding assessments feel lonely now!”
![Testimonial avatar](https://lightscreen.ai/female_stock.svg)
Reeti B.
Software Engineer at JP Morgan Chase
“It felt basically like a usual tech interview, but with an interviewer who’s especially knowledgeable and interested in my thought process. I was able to ask questions and get hints, which was super helpful. I felt like I was able to show my best self.”
![Testimonial avatar](https://lightscreen.ai/man_stock.svg)
Archit K.
Software Engineer at Google
## Accelerate your hiring pipeline with AI.
Lightscreen AI| Other Screening Tools  
---|---  
Cheating Detection| Human-level multimodal AI detector| Easily defeated techniques  
Assessment Areas| Coding skills, problem-solving, communication| Only code correctness  
Details for Hiring Team| Key insights, video, transcript, and code timeline| Only code  
Enterprise Integration| Fully customizable experience, criteria, and ATS integrations| Varies  
[Interested? Let’s Talk!](https://lightscreen.ai/</business>)
© 2024 Lightscreen, Inc. All rights reserved. Contact **team@lightscreen.ai** with any inquiries. [Privacy Policy](https://lightscreen.ai/</privacy-policy.html>)

generated_description:
**Lightscreen AI: Revolutionizing Technical Interviewing**

Founded in 2024 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch F24, Lightscreen AI is on a mission to transform the hiring landscape with their voice and video AI interviewer. Based in Sunnyvale, CA, and operating with a small team of two, the company is already making waves in the recruiting industry, particularly among high-growth startups and recruitment agencies.

**What They Do**

Lightscreen AI offers a sophisticated voicebot named Ethan that conducts full-length technical interviews. What sets Ethan apart? It cleverly incorporates smart interruptions and multi-modal cheating detection, ensuring that interviews not only assess candidates effectively but do so with an engaging and supportive experience. This AI-driven approach is poised to disrupt traditional hiring methods by providing companies with detailed, rubric-based evaluations that can be tailored to their unique requirements.

**Key Features:**
- **Realistic Interview Experience**: Candidates interact with Ethan in a way that feels reminiscent of human interviews. They can ask questions, receive hints, and brainstorm collaboratively, creating an environment that brings out their true potential.
- **Robust Cheating Detection**: Lightscreen AI employs advanced techniques to identify cheating and ensures that candidates must truly demonstrate their skills to succeed, making it harder for dishonest practices to go unnoticed.
- **Rapid Feedback**: After interviews, companies receive prompt notifications alongside transcripts, video footage, and key indicators, enabling fast decision-making—an essential factor since over 80% of candidates complain about slow recruiter responses.

**Impact and Reception**

The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, with over 80% of candidates reporting a satisfying experience. They appreciate how the process adapts to their skill levels and allows them to showcase their thought processes more clearly than traditional coding assessments.

Lightscreen AI is not just another screening tool; it's a forward-thinking solution designed to tackle modern challenges in the recruitment space while promoting fairness and efficiency.

**Key Stats & Tags**
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Location**: Sunnyvale, CA
- **Team**: 2 employees
- **Supported by**: Dalton Caldwell (Group Partner, Y Combinator)
- **Tags**: Artificial Intelligence, SaaS, Recruiting, Talent Acquisition, Conversational AI, San Francisco Bay Area.

For companies looking to hire genuinely skilled engineers without the hassle of traditional interview processes, **Lightscreen AI** may just be the game-changing solution they need. Want to see it in action? [Book a demo](https://lightscreen.ai/) to experience the future of hiring firsthand.
